text: First of all, the BATTERY LIFE is Excellent!  BUT if you are Newbie, battery life will SUCK!  Why?Because you are newbie!  Understand battery life takes into consideration how many things are turned on  and how much juice you are currently using.  Let me give you an example.Your Home is POWERED by electricity,  and the more stuff you have turned on, TV, air conditionair, fans, refrig,  freezer, etc ... the higher your electric bill.  Are you with me so far?  With the IPAD, apple wanted to impress you with WOW factor when you got your IPAD, so it turns on tons of stuff, and has lots of stuff going in the background, using POWER.  YOU the USER will have to turn OFF the features you are NOT USING to increase how LONG the battery lasts.WIFI, Bluetooth, screen brightness, games and apps... going in the background, might NEED to be TURNED OFF if you don't need them at the moment.  ( example you don't need to turn on A.C. in your home in the middle of winter).... watch YouTube videos for tips and pointers on turning off/on only the features you need at the moment and learn all the cool things this device can do.I made this review when I read a number of posts of NEWBIE'S saying they got the IPAD and returned it because the battery life sucks.
title: great battery LIFE
